attributes.name: action_number
attributes.prompt: Enter the action number.

attributes.name: action_name
attributes.prompt: Enter the action name.

attributes.name: problem_description
attributes.prompt: Describe the problem or the statement related to the action.

attributes.name: solution_description
attributes.prompt: Describe the solution or action to be taken.

attributes.name: action_category
attributes.prompt: Select the category of the action.

attributes.name: action_type
attributes.prompt: Select the type of action.
options: Plan & Reg - Studies and/or Risk Assessment
Prop Protect & Infra - Community Infrastructure (Drainage, Utilities)
Nat Res Prot & Restore - Wetland Protection/Restoration

attributes.name: action_type_specific
attributes.prompt: Specify the specific type of action if applicable.

attributes.name: associated_hazards
attributes.prompt: Select the hazards associated with the action.

attributes.name: estimated_cost_original
attributes.prompt: TO BE MOVED TO SUBSEQUENT 3 COLUMNS

attributes.name: estimated_cost_amt
attributes.prompt: Enter the estimated cost in dollars.

attributes.name: estimated_cost_range
attributes.prompt: Select the range of estimated cost.

attributes.name: estimated_cost_text
attributes.prompt: Enter the estimated cost in text format.

attributes.name: benefits_losses_avoided
attributes.prompt: Describe the benefits and losses avoided.

attributes.name: potential_primary_funding_sources
attributes.prompt: Select the primary funding sources.

attributes.name: potential_primary_funding_sources_other
attributes.prompt: Specify other potential funding sources if any.

attributes.name: eta_implementation
attributes.prompt: Enter the estimated time required for project implementation.

attributes.name: existing_planning_mechanism
attributes.prompt: Describe any existing planning mechanisms to be used in implementation.

attributes.name: action_county
attributes.prompt: Select the county where the action takes place. If the action is located in a different county you can select it by clicking the dropdown.

attributes.name: action_jurisdiction
attributes.prompt: Provide the name of the Town, Village or City where the action is located. For example; Sullivan County has adopted a hazard mitigation plan, the Town of Callicoon is the jurisdiction location of the specific action, such as acquiring emergency generators for critical facilities.

attributes.name: action_location
attributes.prompt: Enter the geometry information (latitude/longitude, polygon, etc.).

attributes.name: action_address
attributes.prompt: Enter the address if available (auto-complete if possible).

attributes.name: shmp_goal_objective
attributes.prompt: Select the goals and objectives related to SHMP.

attributes.name: lhmp_goal_objective
attributes.prompt: Enter the goals and objectives related to LHMP.

attributes.name: is_related_to_critical_facility
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action is related to a critical facility.

attributes.name: alternative_action_1
attributes.prompt: Describe the alternative action 1.

attributes.name: alternative_action_1_evaluation
attributes.prompt: Evaluate alternative action 1.

attributes.name: is_addressing_climate_change
attributes.display_name: Is this action addressing Climate Change?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action addresses climate change.

attributes.name: is_mitigating_climate_change
attributes.display_name: Is this action mitigating Climate Change?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action mitigates climate change (e.g., GHG reduction).

attributes.name: known_concerns
attributes.display_name: Known Environmental, Historic Preservation or Protected Species Concerns
attributes.prompt: Describe any known concerns related to environmental, historic preservation, or protected species.

attributes.name: risk_to_vulnerable_population
attributes.display_name: Does this action protect or include assessment of risk to vulnerable populations?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action protects or assesses risk to vulnerable populations.

attributes.name: requires_engineering_professionals
attributes.display_name: Does this action require input or designs from engineering professionals?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action requires input or designs from engineering professionals.

attributes.name: is_study_design_or_plan_completed
attributes.display_name: Have any studies, designs, or plans been completed?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if any studies, designs, or plans have been completed.

attributes.name: is_final_engineering_complete
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the final engineering design is complete.

attributes.name: is_bca_complete
attributes.display_name: Has a Benefit Cost Analysis (BCA) been completed?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if a Benefit Cost Analysis (BCA) has been completed.

attributes.name: is_bca_greater_than_1
attributes.display_name: If yes (BCA), is the Benefit Cost Ratio >1?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the Benefit Cost Ratio is greater than 1.

attributes.name: are_resources_available
attributes.display_name: If no (BCA), are resources available to complete a BCA?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if resources are available to complete a BCA.

attributes.name: is_action_protecting_against_repetitive_loss_properties
attributes.display_name: Does this action protect Repetitive or Severe Repetitive Loss Properties?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action protects against repetitive or severe repetitive loss properties.

attributes.name: can_support_crs
attributes.display_name: Can this action support points for Community Rating System (CRS)?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action can support points for Community Rating System (CRS).

attributes.name: aligns_with_csc_action
attributes.display_name: Does this action align with a Climate Smart Communities action?
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action aligns with a Climate Smart Communities action.

attributes.name: lead_ny_state_agency
attributes.prompt: Select the lead NY State Agency if applicable.

attributes.name: lead_agency_name_text
attributes.prompt: Enter the name of the lead agency or department.

attributes.name: partners
attributes.prompt: Enter the partners involved in the action.

attributes.name: contact_name
attributes.prompt: Enter the name of the action point of contact.

attributes.name: contact_title
attributes.prompt: Enter the title of the action point of contact.

attributes.name: contact_email
attributes.prompt: Enter the email of the action point of contact.

attributes.name: action_creation_date
attributes.prompt: This field is auto-generated and back-dated.

attributes.name: included_in_last_hmp
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action was included in the last Hazard Mitigation Plan (HMP).

attributes.name: status
attributes.prompt: Select the status of the action.

attributes.name: status_date
attributes.prompt: Enter the date of the action status.

attributes.name: status_details
attributes.prompt: Provide details about the action status.

attributes.name: calculated_cost
attributes.prompt: Enter the calculated cost of the action.

attributes.name: secured_funding_source
attributes.prompt: Enter the name of secured funding sources.

attributes.name: status_history
attributes.prompt: Availability of action status history.

attributes.name: is_ready_for_state_or_fema_plan_approval
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action is ready for State/FEMA plan approval.

attributes.name: is_approvable
attributes.prompt: Indicate if the action is approvable.

attributes.name: dhses_comments
attributes.prompt: Provide comments from DHSES.

attributes.name: fema_comments
attributes.prompt: Provide comments from FEMA.

attributes.name: transportation_infrastructure
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on transportation infrastructure.

attributes.name: energy_infrastructure
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on energy infrastructure.

attributes.name: water_infrastructure
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on water infrastructure.

attributes.name: communication_infrastructure
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on communications infrastructure.

attributes.name: buildings
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on buildings.

attributes.name: natural_environment
attributes.prompt: Indicate the impact on the natural environment.

attributes.name: prioritization
attributes.prompt: Select the prioritization level for the action.

attributes.name: probability_of_acceptance
attributes.prompt: Select the probability of the action's acceptance.
options: (4) Likely to be endorsed by the entire population
(2) Would be somewhat controversial with special interest groups or a small percentage of the population
(3) Of benefit only to those directly affected and would not adversely affect others
(1) Would be strongly opposed by special interest groups or a significant percentage of the population

attributes.name: funding_availability
attributes.prompt: Select the availability of funding for the action.
options: (3) Can be funded by operating budget

attributes.name: probability_of_matching_funds
attributes.prompt: Select the probability of matching funds for the action.
options: (4) Funding match is available or funding match not required
(0) No funding match available or funding match unknown

attributes.name: bcr
attributes.prompt: Select the outcome of the Benefit Cost Review for the action.
options: (4) Likely to meet Benefit Cost Review

attributes.name: environmental_benefit
attributes.prompt: Select the environmental benefit of the action.
options: (4) Environmentally sound and relatively easy to implement; or no adverse impact on environment
(3) Environmentally acceptable and not anticipated to be difficult to implement
(2) Environmental concerns and somewhat difficult to implement because of complex requirements
(4) Likely to meet Benefit Cost Review
(1) Difficult to implement because of significantly complex requirements and environmental permitting
(0) Very difficult to implement due to extremely complex requirements and environmental permitting problems

attributes.name: total_score
attributes.prompt: Calculate the total score for the action.

attributes.name: community_acceptance
attributes.prompt: Select the level of community acceptance for the action.

attributes.name: effect_on_segment_of_population
attributes.prompt: Select the effect of the action on a segment of the population.

attributes.name: technical_feasibility
attributes.prompt: Select the technical feasibility of the action.

attributes.name: long_term_solution
attributes.prompt: Select if the action provides a long-term solution.

attributes.name: secondary_impacts
attributes.prompt: Select the secondary impacts of the action.

attributes.name: staffing
attributes.prompt: Select the staffing requirements for the action.

attributes.name: funding_allocated
attributes.prompt: Select the funding allocated for the action.

attributes.name: maintenance_or_operations
attributes.prompt: Select the maintenance or operations requirements for the action.

attributes.name: political_support
attributes.prompt: Select the level of political support for the action.

attributes.name: local_champion
attributes.prompt: Select if there is a local champion for the action.

attributes.name: public_support
attributes.prompt: Select the level of public support for the action.

attributes.name: state_authority
attributes.prompt: Select the state authority for the action.

attributes.name: existing_local_authority
attributes.prompt: Select the existing local authority for the action.

attributes.name: potential_legal_challenge
attributes.prompt: Select the potential legal challenges for the action.

attributes.name: benefit
attributes.prompt: Select the overall benefit of the action.

attributes.name: cost
attributes.prompt: Select the overall cost of the action.

attributes.name: contributions_to_economic_goals
attributes.prompt: Select if the action contributes to economic goals.

attributes.name: outside_funding_required
attributes.prompt: Select if outside funding is required for the action.

attributes.name: effect_on_land_or_water
attributes.prompt: Select the effect of the action on land or water.

attributes.name: effect_on_endangered_species
attributes.prompt: Select the effect of the action on endangered species.

attributes.name: effect_on_hazmat_or_waste_sites
attributes.prompt: Select the effect of the action on HAZMAT or waste sites.

attributes.name: consistent_with_community_env_goals
attributes.prompt: Select if the action is consistent with community environmental goals.

attributes.name: consistent_with_federal_goals
attributes.prompt: Select if the action is consistent with federal laws.

attributes.name: total_staplee_score
attributes.prompt: Calculate the total STAPLEE score for the action.

attributes.name: priority_other
attributes.prompt: Enter any additional priority information for the action.
